sentence.text: It will break , and Sony customer service is of zero help , even though the camera is 6 moths old and under warranty .

They provide a quick start manual about 30 pages that does not begin to cover the camera 's features , and it is tricky to locate the 200 + page manual online that covers everything , and even the longer manual does n't explain everything .
